Uses of Class
xxl.core.collections.queues.Heap

Packages that use Heap
xxl.core.collections.queues The package xxl.core.collections.queues provides miscellaneous implementations of the queue datastructure. 
xxl.core.cursors.groupers The package xxl.core.cursors.groupers provides miscellaneous implementations of the group operator on cursors. 
xxl.core.indexStructures Provides important index structures like B-trees, R-trees, M-trees and bulk-loading-algorithms.

Subclasses of Heap in xxl.core.indexStructures
